description:
Hordy`s twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-Man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi`s brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to Zero! Earnest Wishes for Luffy!
Repartir à zéro ! Le souhait de Fukaboshi !
Zero ni! Luffy e no Atsuki Negai!
С чистого листа! Искренняя просьба к Луффи!
ゼロに! ルフィへの熱き願い!
